diagram:
@startuml
participant User as "Hospital Staff"
participant PatientRegistrationSystem as "Patient Registration\nService"
participant InsuranceVerificationService as "Insurance Verification\nWeb Service"
participant HospitalDatabase as "Hospital Database"
participant BillingSystem as "Billing System"
User->>PatientRegistrationSystem: Register Patient
PatientRegistrationSystem->>HospitalDatabase: Create Patient Record
PatientRegistrationSystem<<--HospitalDatabase: Patient ID
PatientRegistrationSystem->>InsuranceVerificationService: Verify Insurance
InsuranceVerificationService->>InsuranceVerificationService: Check Policy Status
InsuranceVerificationService<<--InsuranceVerificationService: Verification Result
alt Verification Successful
    InsuranceVerificationService->>PatientRegistrationSystem: Verification Success
    PatientRegistrationSystem->>BillingSystem: Generate Bill
    BillingSystem->>HospitalDatabase: Update Billing Info
    note over BillingSystem, HospitalDatabase: Business Rule: Update billing info only if insurance is verified
else Verification Failed
    InsuranceVerificationService->>PatientRegistrationSystem: Verification Failed
    PatientRegistrationSystem->>User: Notify Staff of Verification Failure
    note over PatientRegistrationSystem, User: Business Rule: Notify staff if verification fails
end
User->>PatientRegistrationSystem: Request Appointment
PatientRegistrationSystem->>HospitalDatabase: Schedule Appointment
HospitalDatabase<<--PatientRegistrationSystem: Appointment Confirmation
note over HospitalDatabase: Business Rule: Validate appointment schedule against hospital capacity
@enduml
